text: Betty Brewer (born November 23, 1923) is a former American child actress. She was born in Joplin, Missouri, United States. Brewer made her film debut in Rangers of Fortune (1940). In 1944, she acted with a troupe headed by Katharine Cornell that toured in war zones. On October 24, 1944, Brewer married Lieutenant Robert A. Hester in Florence Italy. ==Selected filmography== *The Round Up (1941) *Las Vegas Nights (1941) *Mrs. Wiggs of the Cabbage Patch (1942) *Wild Bill Hickok Rides (1942) * Juke Girl (1942) * My Kingdom for a Cook (1943) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:American film actresses Category:American child actresses Category:People from Joplin, Missouri
title: Betty Brewer
